ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX50V GPS Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Black) + <2> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <3> Spare NP-BX1 Battery for Sony +
<4> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <5> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <6> PD-C10 Camera / Camcorder Case +
<7> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <12> Image Recovery Software
